knimeNode.name: Set To List
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node replaces any selected Set Collection cells with List Collection cells

intro.p: This nodes converts any Set collection cells in selected columns to List collection cells. Sets do not necessarily have a defined order, and may not contain duplicates. List collections have a defined order.
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: Select the incoming Set column(s) to convert to lists
If this option is checked, then the cells will be sorted in ascending order of their comparator, otherwise they will be in iteration order of the set
Should the node execution fail if there are no matching collection columns?

ports.outPort: The input table with collections converted from Sets to Lists
